creator: Alexander Terp
title: RAD-321: int/float arg typing: range
description:
e.g. `truncate(_str: str, _len: int[0,]) -> str`

^^ don't like that actually, can be confusing with lists. Could be better for a syntax to say an int list with 0 or more elements in that example (tho redundant).

Maybe e.g. `_len: [0,]` ? Similar issue tho… HMM
